div.p: Call for Bids to Provide Training on the following Course for 150 ETD Practitioners of HWSETA Accredited / Approved and Prospective Skills Development Providers in Five selected Provinces: 115759: Conduct Moderation of Outcome Based Assessments. The HWSETA wishes to appoint an accredited/Approved and prospective Skills Development Provider (SDP) to train 150 ETD Practitioners of the HWSETA in five Provinces.
The following bidders submitted their proposals:

Sogwa Solutions; Training B2B; Training at Work; Lephalale Core Skills Academy; Assessment College of SA; DM Management and Consulting; Zubuntu Management; Kgang-Kgolo; Sail Southern Institute of Learning; MSP; Tlotlang Thuto Training and Consulting; PMA Holding; Primserv Corporate Solutions; History Makers; Khosithi Training; Bantubanye Skills; NCD; Faranang Business Solutions; Inkwenkwezi Private Cause; Boardergates Events Management; Kholau Group of Companies; HRD Training and Consulting; Xtensive Academy;Bohlali Provider Support; The Training Edge; Tembe Service Providers; Nomngwanishe Investment; ATTI; ENJO Consulting; Emergence Human Capital; Batho Pele; Siza Nesu; KMS College; Sowing Seed; Lona Ulwazi Consultants; Designa Qualifications; Amandlolwazi; Halcyspace; M28 Trading Enterprise; Pineridge Training Centre; Simskhula; Katiso Kuno; PC Educational Holding; Project Literacy; Vutlhari By Dzonga Consultants; Aubrey Nyiko Business Enterprise; Central Business Academy; Edutel Skills Development; Africa Competency Development; The Training Edge

Call for Bids to provide training on the following Unit Standard for 197 Skills Development Providers Accredited and Approved by the HWSETA for full qualifications in five provinces. 116587: Develop, support and Promote RPL Practices. The HWSETA wishes to appoint an accredited and approved Skills Development Provider (SDP) to train 197 RPL Practitioners of the HWSETA in five provinces.
The following bidders submitted their proposals:

Networx
Zubuntu Management
PMA Holdings
KMS College
PI Company SA
PC Educational Holdings
Resonance
Edutel

div.h6: Supplier to provide Travel Agency Services to the HWSETA within the borders of South Africa for the period of one year
div.p:
Name of Bidder: Atlantis Corporate Travel
Point Score for Price: 90
BBBEE Status Level of Contribution: 9
Total Score: 99
Price: Average of R46.00 per request
div.h6: Training of 150 Labour Representatives on Skills Development Facilitator course
div.p:
Name of Bidder: HRD Training Consulting
Point Score for Price: 90
BBBEE Status Level of Contribution: 5
Total Score: 95
Price: R1 874 700.00
div.h6:
For the Training of 100 ETD Practitioners of HWSETA’s Accredited and Approved SDPs in the five selected provinces
115755: Design and Develop Outcome-Based assessments
115753: Conduct outcomes-based assessment
div.p:
Name of Bidder: Xtensive Academy
Point Score for Price: 90
BBBEE Status Level of Contribution: 9
Total Score: 99
Price: R530 100.00
div.h6:
For the Training of 100 ETD Practitioners of HWSETA’s Accredited and Approved SDPs in the five selected provinces
115759: Conduct Moderation of Outcome-Based Assessment
123394: Develop Outcome-Based Learning Programmes
div.p: The HWSETA has decided NOT TO award this tender. Below is a list of suppliers who submitted their proposals:

PC Educational Holdings; Primserv; Ulwazi Training and Development; History Makers Business Consulting; M28 Training and Development; Faranang Business and Trining Solutions JV Isamon Integrated; Vulthari Bya Dzongas; Resonance Institute of Learning; Pitt Instituate JV Imsimbi; Bulls Business and Skills Training BBT Trading as NSA Consultants; MTK Corporate Solutions; Eskil; Omni HR Consulting; Mogale Solution Provider; Knowledge Quest PTY Ltd; Regenesys Business School; Xtensive Academy; Network for Career Development; Quality Executive Development; D and D Lwazi Renaissance Research Development Institute; Academy of People Development; Sigodi Development Services JV Lona Ulwazi; Edutel Skills Development; Training at Work; Verycoolideas; Siza Nesu Trading 7; Accreditation and Training Services; Regent Business School.
For more information please contact Mrs. N Motloung in the Procurement Unit on (011) 607 6900. Tel: (011) 607 6900. Fax: (011) 615 4078. Email: ntombizodwam@hwseta.org.za
